Tag_Youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | [[The Silver Vein]], a branch of the [[Cult of Kosmos]] this memory is based on

General_Description: '''The Worshippers of the Bloodline''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: To some, like the [[Worshippers of the Bloodline]], Kosmos lived in the blood of [[Alexios|Deimos]]. To worship Deimos was to worship chaos itself, and all other blood would be the sacrifice they'd offer.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every member of the Worshippers of the Bloodline branch.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
